meanings.definition: A woman who is not married.
meanings.sent1: The small town had a few spinsters who lived alone.
meanings.sent2: In the olden days, spinsters were sometimes seen as mysterious figures.
meanings.sent3: The spinsters at the library always had the best book recommendations.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with flowers, each one representing a different spinster.
meanings.sent5: The spinsters in the village wore colorful shawls and chatted by the fountain every afternoon.

meanings.sent1: The spinsters gathered every Sunday for tea and gossip.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted a group of elegant spinsters strolling in the park.
meanings.sent3: The spinsters decided to start a book club to pass the time.
meanings.sent4: The forest echoed with the laughter of the merry spinster group.
meanings.sent5: The spinsters organized a charity event to help the local community.
